dnd5e_scriptlets.LukasSheetFilter.Name: Add Filter field to character sheet
dnd5e_scriptlets.LukasSheetFilter.Hint: Allows you to filter character sheet items/spells/features by a text filter. Thansk @Lukas

dnd5e_scriptlets.AmmoSelector.Name: Ammo Selector
dnd5e_scriptlets.AmmoSelector.Hint: Enable to present a select ammo dialog when using a ranged weapon
